summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding a sealing motion in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The email requests edits before sending the motion to a judge, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, working on the sealing motion in the Ghislaine Maxwell case from the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Sealing Motion Preparation
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney prepares and seeks edits for a sealing motion in the Ghislaine Maxwell case before sending it to a judge.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated April 9, 2021, concerning a sealing motion in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The sender is an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The email indicates active legal preparation and coordination regarding sealing procedures in the Maxwell prosecution.
